729659f-b.title: Richmond: Signs Road - Richmond Avenue
729659f-b.text:
(1)
150 Signs SSoad, north side, west of Richmond Avenue, showing an old farmhouse. It belonged to Nrs. M. D. Vroom in 1874; to RoYert and ienry Vroom and rs. S. Brown in 1898, and to Charles. E. Griffith and Son in 1907. The view is east toward Richmond
Avenue.
June 29, 1933
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The rear of the house, looking westward. Ch the extreme right is seen the Asburv Methodist Episcopal
Church, on Richmond Avenue.
JJune 29, 1933
P. L. Sperr
(3)
Another view of the rear of the house and the
driveway.
June 29, 1933
P. L. Sperr
